data_table.description: The Phase 2 Exam was conducted between 2000 and 2004. This dataset includes history of hypertension, myocardial infarction, coronary revascularization, stroke, diabetes, lung disease, cancer, smoking history, physical activity, alcohol use; and for women: menopause status, pregnancy status and pregnancy history.

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: De-identified Subject Identifier

variable.name: HYT
variable.description: Have you ever been told by a physician that you have high blood pressure or hypertension?

variable.name: HYT_YR
variable.description: In what year or how old were you when it was first diagnosed? - year

variable.name: HYT_AGE
variable.description: In what year or how old were you when it was first diagnosed? - age

variable.name: HYT_MED
variable.description: Has medication ever been prescribed by a physician to lower your blood pressure?

variable.name: HMED_YR
variable.description: In what year or how old were you when medication was first prescribed? - year

variable.name: HMED_AGE
variable.description: In what year or how old were you when medication was first prescribed? - age

variable.name: HYT_RX
variable.description: Are you currently taking prescription medication to lower your blood pressure?

variable.name: HYT_RXYR
variable.description: In what year or how old were you when you last took prescription medication to lower your bp? -year

variable.name: HYT_RXAGE
variable.description: In what year or how old were you when you last took prescription medication to lower your bp? -age

variable.name: ARTBLOCK
variable.description: Have you ever been told by a physician that arteries of your heart may be blocked?

variable.name: ARTBLOCKYR
variable.description: In what year or how old were you when you were first told this? - year

variable.name: ARTBLOCKAGE
variable.description: In what year or how old were you when you were first told this? - age

variable.name: ANGIO
variable.description: Have you ever had a coronary angiogram to determine whether the arteries of your heart were blocked?

variable.name: ANGIOYR
variable.description: In what year or how old were you when you first had this procedure? - year

variable.name: ANGIOAGE
variable.description: In what year or how old were you when you first had this procedure? - age

variable.name: MI
variable.description: Have you ever been told by a physician that you had a heart attack or myocardial infarction?

variable.name: MI_YR
variable.description: In what year or how old were you when it first occurred? - year

variable.name: MI_AGE
variable.description: In what year or how old were you when it first occurred? - age

variable.name: MI_HOSP
variable.description: Were you hospitalized for this?

variable.name: ARTERIES
variable.description: Have you ever had coronary bypass surgery/angioplasty/balloon dilation/or stent because of blocked arteries?

variable.name: ART_YR
variable.description: In what year or how old were you when you first had this procedure? - year

variable.name: ART_AGE
variable.description: In what year or how old were you when you first had this procedure? - age

variable.name: STROKE
variable.description: Have you ever been told by a physician that you had a stroke/cerebral hemorrhage/ or brain attack?

variable.name: STRK_YR
variable.description: In what year or how old were you when it first occurred? - year

variable.name: STRK_AGE
variable.description: In what year or how old were you when it first occurred? - age

variable.name: STRKHOSP
variable.description: Were you hospitalized for this?

variable.name: CAROTID
variable.description: Have you ever had surgery on a carotid artery in the neck because the artery was blocked?

variable.name: CAROTIDYR
variable.description: In what year or how old were you when you first had this procedure? - year

variable.name: CAROTIDAGE
variable.description: In what year or how old were you when you first had this procedure? - age

variable.name: HBS
variable.description: Have you ever been told by a physician that you had diabetes or high blood sugar?

variable.name: HBS_YR
variable.description: In what year or how old were you when it was first diagnosed? - year

variable.name: HBS_AGE
variable.description: In what year or how old were you when it was first diagnosed? - age

variable.name: HBS_MED
variable.description: Has oral medication ever been prescribed by a physician for treatment of your diabetes or high blood sugar?

variable.name: HBSMED_Y
variable.description: In what year or how old were you when it was first prescribed? - year

variable.name: HBSMED_A
variable.description: In what year or how old were you when it was first prescribed? - age

variable.name: hbs_ins
variable.description: Has insulin ever been prescribed by a physician for treatment of your diabetes or high blood sugar?

variable.name: IN_YR
variable.description: In what year or how old were you when insulin was first prescribed? - year

variable.name: IN_AGE
variable.description: In what year or how old were you when insulin was first prescribed? - age

variable.name: LUNG
variable.description: Have you ever been told by a physician that you had emphysema/chronic bronchitis/or obstructive lung disease?

variable.name: LUNGYR
variable.description: In what year or how old were you when this condition was first diagnosed? - year

variable.name: LUNGAGE
variable.description: In what year or how old were you when this condition was first diagnosed? - age

variable.name: CANCER
variable.description: Have you ever been told by a physician that you had any form of cancer including melanoma?

variable.name: CANCERYR
variable.description: In what year or how old were you when you were diagnosed with cancer? - year

variable.name: CANCERAGE
variable.description: In what year or how old were you when you were diagnosed with cancer? - age

variable.name: NO_ACT
variable.description: What is the average # of hours you spend per day in: no activity

variable.name: HEAVYACT
variable.description: What is the average # of hours you spend per day in: heavy activity

variable.name: MOD_ACT
variable.description: What is the average # of hours you spend per day in: moderate activity

variable.name: SLIGHTACT
variable.description: What is the average # of hours you spend per day in: slight activity

variable.name: SED_ACT
variable.description: What is the average # of hours you spend per day in: sedentary activity

variable.name: TOTALHRS
variable.description: Total hours of physical activity - must equal 24

variable.name: WKDAYHRS
variable.description: How many hours per weekday do you sit and watch television or sit in front of a computer (at home)?

variable.name: WKENDHRS
variable.description: How many hours per weekend day do you sit and watch television or sit in front of a computer (at home)?

variable.name: SMOKE100
variable.description: Have you smoked more than 100 cigarettes in your entire life?

variable.name: FSMK_YR
variable.description: In what year or how old were you when you first started smoking? - year

variable.name: FSMK_AGE
variable.description: In what year or how old were you when you first started smoking? - age

variable.name: CIGARETT
variable.description: Do you now smoke cigarettes?

variable.name: LSMK_YR
variable.description: In what year or how old were you when you last quit smoking? - year

variable.name: LSMK_AGE
variable.description: In what year or how old were you when you last quit smoking? - age

variable.name: AVGCIGDY
variable.description: On average; how many cigarettes per day do/did you usually smoke?

variable.name: SMK2NDH
variable.description: How many hours per week are you exposed to second hand smoke?

variable.name: ALCOHOL
variable.description: Would you describe yourself as a person who never drinks alcoholic beverages or a person who sometimes drinks?

variable.name: ALCOHOLN
variable.description: Comment field

variable.name: BEER
variable.description: Do you drink any of the following beverages at least once per month? - beer

variable.name: WCOOLER
variable.description: Do you drink any of the following beverages at least once per month? - wine cooler

variable.name: WINE
variable.description: Do you drink any of the following beverages at least once per month? - wine

variable.name: LIQUOR
variable.description: Do you drink any of the following beverages at least once per month? - liquor

variable.name: BEERW
variable.description: For each alcoholic beverage: what is the avg. # of servings you drink in a typical week/month? - beer/week

variable.name: BEERM
variable.description: For each alcoholic beverage: what is the avg. # of servings you drink in a typical week/month? - beer/month

variable.name: WCOOLERW
variable.description: For each alcoholic beverage: what is the avg. # of servings you drink in a typical week/month? - wine cooler/month

variable.name: WCOOLERM
variable.description: For each alcoholic beverage: what is the avg. # of servings you drink in a typical week/month? - wine cooler/week

variable.name: WINEW
variable.description: For each alcoholic beverage: what is the avg. # of servings you drink in a typical week/month? - wine/week

variable.name: WINEM
variable.description: For each alcoholic beverage: what is the avg. # of servings you drink in a typical week/month? - wine/month

variable.name: LIQUORW
variable.description: For each alcoholic beverage: what is the avg. # of servings you drink in a typical week/month? - liquor/week

variable.name: LIQUORM
variable.description: For each alcoholic beverage: what is the avg. # of servings you drink in a typical week/month? - liquor/month

variable.name: BEERSIZE
variable.description: For each alcoholic beverage: what is the usual size of the serving you drink? - beer

variable.name: WCSIZE
variable.description: For each alcoholic beverage: what is the usual size of the serving you drink? - wine cooler

variable.name: WINESIZE
variable.description: For each alcoholic beverage: what is the usual size of the serving you drink? - wine

variable.name: LIQSIZE
variable.description: For each alcoholic beverage: what is the usual size of the serving you drink? - liquor

variable.name: MENOP
variable.description: Have you reached menopause?

variable.name: MENONAT
variable.description: Was your menopause natural/or the result of surgery/radiation/or chemotherapy? - natural

variable.name: MENOSURG
variable.description: Was your menopause natural/or the result of surgery/radiation/or chemotherapy? - surgery

variable.name: MENORAD
variable.description: Was your menopause natural/or the result of surgery/radiation/or chemotherapy? - radiation

variable.name: MENOCHEMO
variable.description: Was your menopause natural/or the result of surgery/radiation/or chemotherapy? - chemotherapy

variable.name: MENO_OTHER
variable.description: Was your menopause natural/or the result of surgery/radiation/or chemotherapy? - other

variable.name: MENO_YR
variable.description: In what year or how old were you when you reached menopause? - year

variable.name: MENO_AGE
variable.description: In what year or how old were you when you reached menopause? - age

variable.name: HOR_EST
variable.description: In the last month have you taken or used any pills/skin patches/or shots for hormone or estrogen therapy?

variable.name: PREGNANT
variable.description: Are you pregnant?

variable.name: BREASTF
variable.description: Are you nursing/breastfeeding?

variable.name: BIRTHC
variable.description: In the last month have you taken or used any oral contraceptives/shots/or implants for birth control?

variable.name: PG6MO
variable.description: Have you had at least one pregnancy that lasted more than 6 months?

variable.name: PG6MOAMT
variable.description: How many?

variable.name: PG_HYT
variable.description: During any of these pregancies were you ever told by a physician that you had high blood pressure or hyt?

variable.name: PGHYTFREQ
variable.description: Did the hypertension occur: in 1st pregnancy/not in 1st pregnancy but in subsequent pregnancies/ etc.

variable.name: PGHYTYR
variable.description: In what year or how old were you when the pregnancy-related hypertension first occurred? - year

variable.name: PGHYTAGE
variable.description: In what year or how old were you when the pregnancy-related hypertension first occurred? - age

variable.name: PROTEIN
variable.description: During any of the pregnancies in which you developed hypertension; did a physician ever tell you that you had protein or albumin in the urine?

variable.name: SEIZURE
variable.description: During any of the pregnancies in which you developed hypertension; did a physician ever tell you that you hadseizure/convulsion?

variable.name: TOXEMIA
variable.description: During any of the pregnancies in which you developed hypertension; did a physician ever tell you that you had preeclampsia/eclampsia toxemia of pregnancy?
